DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to investigate safety, tolerability, pharmacodynamics, and pharmacokinetics after intravenous administration of FE 204205 in patients with cirrhotic portal hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Effect of the Study Drug (FE 204205) in Patients With Cirrhotic Portal Hypertension
